headline.main: BULLITT IS NAMED NEAR EAST ENVOY; President's Representative to Study Aid Needs -- Parley With Turks Indicated

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Nov. 25 -- President Roosevelt announced today that he was sending William C. Bullitt, long his chief Ambassador in Europe, to the Near East battle area as special Presidential representative.
abstract: Roosevelt names W C Bullitt special repr to Near East battle area
snippet: WASHINGTON, Nov. 25 -- President Roosevelt announced today that he was sending William C. Bullitt, long his chief Ambassador in Europe, to the Near East battle area as special Presidential representative....

byline.original: Special To THE NEW YORK TIMES
